result.markdown:
---
title: Sanitize
subtitle: A brief word about sanitizing table contents.
---





## Notes

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- ptdata() %>% st_new(notes = "EDA_summary = TRUE") %>% 
  st_make(inspect = TRUE) %>% 
  get_stable_data() 

x$notes
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "EDA\\_summary = TRUE"
```
:::
:::

## File names

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- ptdata() %>% st_new() %>% 
  st_files(r = "my_script.R") %>% 
  st_make(inspect = TRUE) %>% 
  get_stable_data() 

x$notes
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "Source code: my\\_script.R"
```
:::
:::


## Column names 

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
out <- 
  tibble(a_1 = 5) %>% 
  stable(inspect = TRUE) %>% 
  get_stable_data()

out$cols_tex
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "a\\_1 \\\\"
```
:::
:::

## Main table contents

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
out <- 
  tibble(a = "5_2") %>% 
  stable(inspect = TRUE) %>% 
  get_stable_data()

out$tab
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "5\\_2 \\\\"
```
:::
:::

## Span titles

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
out <- 
  ptdata() %>% 
  stable(inspect = TRUE, span = colgroup("foo_this", WT:SCR)) %>% 
  get_stable_data()

out$span_data$tex
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "\\multicolumn{4}{c}{} & \\multicolumn{5}{c}{foo\\_this} \\\\"
[2] "\\cmidrule(lr){5-9}"                                         
```
:::
:::


## Panel names

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data <- tibble(a = c("a_1", "a_1", "a_1", "a_2", "a_2"), 
               b = letters[1:5])

out <- stable(data, panel = "a") 
out[grepl("multicolumn", out)]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "\\multicolumn{1}{l}{\\textbf{a\\_1}}\\\\%--pmtables-insert-panel"        
[2] "\\hline \\multicolumn{1}{l}{\\textbf{a\\_2}}\\\\%--pmtables-insert-panel"
```
:::
:::

## `cols_extra` input

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- letters[1:5]
data <- tibble(a = x, b = x, c = x)
xtra <- tibble(a = "foo%", b = "$\\mu$g", c = "1234 \\% %")
out <- stable(data, cols_extra = xtra)
out[grepl("%", out, fixed = TRUE)]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "foo\\% & $\\mu$g & 1234 \\% % \\\\"
```
:::
:::
